item.title: PROJECT 7 (Scheduling) : ETL JOBS IN ARIFLOW & DOCKER
item.description: There are lot of tools for scheduling in data engineering no doubt, tools like Cron,luigi etc. However I prefer Apache Airflow because it allow me to schedule and monitor my workflow, amidst other wonderful features. Click to check the Web App Built and deployed with Pickle, Streamlit and Heroku
